attributes.action: Ensure Baroness Thatcher has a state funeral
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Baroness Thatcher broke the unions on the 80's and led this country back from the brink of economic breakdown. She restored the Great in Great Briton. She ensured all citizens ahd the right to buy their own homes and oversaw a fairness in our society. She made a decision and she stuck with it. She believed in Great Briton, she lived Great Briton. And let us not forget she is the first female Prime Minister of this country as well as the longest serving.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
